thread.section_title: Dyers RV Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dyers RV | dyersonline.com
thread.title: Bradford Townsend
thread.title_full: Dyers RV reviewed by Bradford Townsend

author: Bradford Townsend
title: Bradford Townsend
text: I purchased a part as pictured on the their website but received a different part. was replaced no problem but note on re-order said customer ordered wrong part. Not the case, they sent the wrong part, it was not according to the picture. I suggest the company not display pictures of wrong parts.
